code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{Pie}from"react-chartjs-2";import{GlobalContext}from"../context/GlobalState";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var Chart=function Chart(){var _useContext=useContext(GlobalContext),transactions=_useContext.transactions;var transactionList=transactions.map(function(transaction){return transaction.transactionType;});var transactionAmount=transactions.map(function(transaction){return JSON.parse(Math.abs(transaction.transactionAmount));});var state={labels:transactionList,datasets:[{label:"Rainfall",backgroundColor:["#B21F00","#C9DE00","#2FDE00","#00A6B4","#6800B4"],hoverBackgroundColor:["#501800","#4B5000","#175000","#003350","#35014F"],data:transactionAmount}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pie,{data:state,options:{title:{display:true,text:"Transactions",fontSize:20},legend:{display:true,position:"right"}}})});};
